amendatorysection.catchline: Foreign labor agent or agency; acts forbidden; license required.
amendatorysection.para: No foreign labor agent, labor bureau or labor agency or other person or corporation domiciled in any other state or territory of the United States shall enter this state and attempt to hire, entice, or solicit or take from this state any common or agricultural workers, singly or in groups, for any purpose without first applying to the Commissioner of Labor for a license as a private employment agency.
